description: Git commit schedule aligned with development phases. Run each git_command after completing the step.
usage: For each step: (1) complete the described work, (2) run: git add -A && <git_command>
github_push: Run 'git push origin main' after every 5-7 commits or after completing a phase

steps.description: Compute per-API health score (0-100): 100 - (threatLevelPenalty + errorRatePenalty + latencyPenalty + unacknowledgedChangePenalty). Update hourly. Store in api_health_scores table. Feed into org health score calculation.

steps.title: API Stability Index
steps.description: Stability Index = 1 - (changeCount / totalDays). Updated weekly. Scale 0-1 (1 = never changed, 0 = changes daily). Show trend: stable ↔ volatile. Flag APIs with stability < 0.5 as high-volatility (notify dependents to be careful).
steps.commit_message: add api stability index based on change frequency

steps.title: SLA Breach Detection
steps.description: Allow teams to configure SLA thresholds: maxErrorRate (e.g. 1%), maxP95Latency (e.g. 500ms). Background monitor checks every 5min. On breach: emit sla:breach event, send immediate CRITICAL notification, create JIRA P1 ticket.
